TextBlock.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color>: An update on the current situation. I... just lost a warp core.

I'm in the process of sealing off Locomocean's refinery and I brought a core by leaping to the planet. I hit a patch of land. On an ocean planet. Not quite the splash I was hoping to make (Ha ha. I'm in pain).
Now, I didn't break anything... I think. But I lost grip of the core and I'm not about to go back to swimming with the fishies to find it. I'll grab another core to use instead.
If I had to guess where it was? Based on the ocean current, probably the <color=orange>South Pole</color>. But I'm not about to go digging in the sand because A) I hate sand, and B) I hate the fish.
